publication.abstract: Situational awareness of urban flooding during storm events is important for disaster and emergency management. However, no general purpose tools yet exist for rendering rainfall accumulations in real-time at the resolution of hydrologic units used for modeling. publication.abstract: In this demonstration paper, we describe the technologies and implementations that allow near real-time creation of new virtual precipitation sensors using NEXRAD Level II streaming data at user-specified point locations and time intervals in an integrated digital watershed with a Google Map-based web interface.
